title: Asset management JV with BlackRock progressing well, says Jio Financial Services
description: On October 19, 2023, Jio Financial and BlackRock Financial Management Inc. filed papers with markets regulator Sebi for launching a mutual fund business. As of March 2024, the application was under process for Sebi's in-principle approval.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
